snippet: Brian Cashman promised that the Yankees will still have significant monetary resources, even if Hal Steinbrenner is more of a fiscal conservative than his father was.
lead_paragraph: Brian Cashman promised that the Yankees will still have significant monetary resources, even if Hal Steinbrenner is more of a fiscal conservative than his father was.
